images.description: SDSS image of spiral galaxy PGC 39562 and compact galaxy PGC 1397873, which comprise IC 3128, also showing spiral galaxy PGC 39557, which is often called IC 3128B
SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy PGC 39562 and compact galaxy PGC 1397873, which comprise IC 3128, also showing spiral galaxy PGC 39557, which is often called IC 3128B
